layout.title: Thai Massage Review Automation | Get More Google Reviews | ThaiSpaPro
layout.description: Automatic review collection for Thai massage businesses. Get more 5-star Google reviews, respond professionally, build your reputation on autopilot.

hero.title: Get the Reviews Your Thai Massage Business Deserves
hero.text: Our system asks happy clients to leave reviews, sends reminders, and builds your reputation while you focus on treatments. More 5-star reviews means more people finding you.

services.title: Your Reputation Grows on Its Own

items.title: People Pick You Over the Competition
items.text: When someone's deciding between you and another place down the road, reviews often make the difference. A business with 80 recent 5-star reviews looks more trustworthy than one with 12 reviews from two years ago. People read what others have said, they feel good about it, they book. Those stars do a lot of the selling for you.

items.title: You Show Up Higher on Google
items.text: Google pays attention to reviews. A business with lots of recent, positive ones gets pushed up in the search results. When someone types "Thai massage near me" you want to be near the top of that list, not buried on page two where nobody looks. Reviews help get you there.

items.title: No More Awkward Asking
items.text: You know that slightly uncomfortable moment after a treatment where you're wondering whether to ask for a review? Most people hate doing it. It can feel pushy. The system handles it for you. Sends a friendly request automatically and follows up if needed.

We went from 12 Google reviews to 147 in just 6 months! Our average rating went from 4.2 to 4.9 stars. New customers constantly mention they chose us because of our excellent reviews. The system makes it so easy - it's completely automated.
items.name: Sophie Turner
items.title: Owner, Serenity Thai Spa

items.text: The review responses alone are worth it. Every review gets a professional, personalised response within hours. We've turned several negative reviews into repeat customers because of how well the responses were handled. Our bookings have increased 40% since we started.
items.name: Daniel Cooper
items.title: Manager, Urban Wellness Centre

features.title: Everything's Already in There
features.text: Collects reviews, responds to them, and protects your rating when things go wrong. Your happy customers become your best marketing without you doing anything.

items.title: Automatic Review Requests
items.text: After each appointment, the system sends a friendly SMS or email asking for a review. Follow-up reminders go to people who don't respond the first time. You end up with far more reviews than if you just asked once and hoped.

items.title: Replies to Positive Reviews
items.text: Every 5-star review gets a proper thank-you response. The AI writes something genuine using the person's name and what they actually said. This makes people feel appreciated, and shows future customers you're paying attention.

items.title: Shares to Facebook Automatically
items.text: New Google reviews get posted to your Facebook page without you doing anything. Good feedback spreads across platforms on its own. More people see it, more people trust you.

items.title: Catches Problems Before They Go Public
items.text: Before sending anyone to Google, the system checks if they're actually happy. If someone had a bad experience, they get directed to give you private feedback instead. Gives you a chance to fix things before it becomes a one-star review for everyone to see.

items.title: Help With the Difficult Ones
items.text: Sometimes negative reviews happen anyway. We help you write responses that handle the situation well. A thoughtful reply to a complaint can actually make you look good, it shows potential customers you care and deal with issues properly.

cta.title: Start Building Your Reputation
cta.text: Let's talk about getting more reviews. We'll show you how the whole thing works.
